text:

This Indian restaurant and bar with Bollywood vibes is an absolute blast! The ambiance is vibrant, lively, and full of energy, transporting you straight to the heart of Bollywood. The food is fantastic‚Äîespecially the paneer pizza, which combines the best of Indian and Italian flavors in one delicious bite! The appetizers are equally impressive, with each dish bursting with authentic spices and fresh ingredients. As the night goes on, the place truly comes alive when the band starts playing, turning the restaurant into a full-on party. It‚Äôs the perfect spot for anyone looking to enjoy great food, music, and unforgettable Bollywood vibes!
Did a takeaway, ordered the paneer tikka pizza. One of the best paneer pizzas in Singapore. Dough is hand stretched, made in house. Generous paneer topping.

Rocking Rickshaw is a fantastic place to enjoy a lively evening with great music and good food. The live band is absolutely amazing, creating a vibrant and energetic atmosphere that keeps the crowd engaged. The DJ is equally wonderful, playing an excellent mix of tracks that keep the mood upbeat and fun.
The food was nice, well-prepared, and flavorful, complementing the overall experience. The service was smooth, and the ambiance had a unique charm that made the evening even more enjoyable.
If you're looking for a place with great entertainment and a fun vibe, Rocking Rickshaw is definitely worth a visit!

I had been there a couple of times, and the place is really ‚Äúcore‚Äù Indian vibe. Good food, good vibe. The only problem is sound level. It will tear down your ear drum. I think they should consider the absorbers of sound and renovate the place to be less lethal for your ears.
